name: Princesses 3D Coloring book - Painting game
description:
If your children like princesses and fairy tales stories, drawing and coloring, this app is perfect for them. They will love these drawings and coloring pages of beautiful fairytale princesses. Download magic princess coloring pages game, and start to color, doodle and paint the best coloring pages. Our coloring book app will allow your kids and toddlers to spend great time with amazing stories drawings and paint or doodle cute princess pictures. You can find the lovely drawings of beautiful princesses with gorgeous dresses, princess makeup and crowns. Your little princess will love this app!
You can choose the colors of the set
• Select the princess you want to color
• Use the color palette
• Press the button and transform the character or the princess with 3D effect
Features:
• They can color princesses with pencils of their choice.
• They can learn how to mix colors and boost their creativity.
• Educational game for children with endless possibilities.
• Child´s can use their fingers as crayons to paint princesses drawings.
